description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. You are the Zombie Hunter.  You are ready to make your Last Stand against the zombie horde.  You are trapped in a small bunker with zombies digging their way up through the ground. With each zombie that you kill, they grow even stronger.  Purchase stronger weapons to help you to last as you can.  Get power ups to give you an advantage against the zombies for a short time.
description.short: You are the Zombie Hunter.  You are ready to make your Last Stand against the zombie horde.  You are trapped in a small bunker with zombies digging their way up through the ground. With each zombie that you kill, they grow even stronger.  Purchase stronger weapons to help you to last as you can.  Get power ups to give you an advantage against the zombies for a short time.
